data.prayer: Father, help the 246,896 believers in Hidalgo to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hidalgo, Mexico

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Hidalgo, Mexico will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Hidalgo do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 246,896 believers in Hidalgo that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people might believe through him.
Please, teach the 246,896 believers in Hidalgo, Mexico how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Hidalgo, Mexico to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Hidalgo, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

location.name: Hidalgo
